Name: Kỳ
description:
Mrs. Kỳ is 59 years old and she is a widow with 2 children. Her husband died and all the difficulties of life lie on her shoulders. Kỳ lives in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in the Thanh Hoa province. She has worked in agriculture growing flowers for more than 10 years. Her income is lower than the national average income, moreover, her job is unstable.

Kỳ is a reputable person in the community. This is her first loan with the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

The main hardship that Kỳ faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase flower seedlings to grow and sell in the future.

Kỳ hopes for her business to do well, to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.
